item.title: Now
item.description: What Iâ€™m doing now Work: I look at Machine Learning and Natural Language stuff for Verloop. We help make customer support more humane. Torschlusspaniki About the word Torschlusspaniki My previous workplaces made a serious dent in the size of my dreams. Psychological safety is a weird concept. I wish more leaders understood this intuitively. Last Updated in October 2019 from Bengaluru, India The concept of now page is from Derek Sivers

Me in 10 seconds I’ve been doing NLP (Natural Language Processing) for a bit, and did Computer Vision, Embedded ML and Predictive Analytics before. Even wrote a book about NLP. I talk a lot about it too. I write blogs about career, technology and business: Newsletter Ambivert, not smart, and curious about weird ideas. Surat, Gujarat native. I now live in Bengaluru. I’m always happy to help those who ask crisp and descriptive questions.
